mapper.insert: INSERT INTO master (business_no, email, master_name, store_name, store_address, store_call_number) VALUES (#{businessNo}, #{email}, #{masterName}, #{storeName}, #{storeAddress}, #{storeCallNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT business_no AS businessNo, store_name AS storeName, store_address AS storeAddress, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt FROM ( SELECT M.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt FROM master M JOIN promotion_board P ON M.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM ) sub WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6

SELECT business_no AS businessNo, store_name AS storeName, store_address AS storeAddress, avg_star_rate AS avgStarRate, review_cnt AS reviewCnt FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, t_master.* FROM ( SELECT M.business_no, store_name, store_address, avg_star_rate, review_cnt FROM master M JOIN promotion_board P ON M.business_no = P.business_no WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%' ORDER BY M.business_no DESC ) t_master) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{page.pageNum} - 1) * #{page.amount} + 1 AND (#{page.pageNum} * #{page.amount})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM master WHERE store_address LIKE '%' || #{storeAddress}|| '%'
